text: are you having a Halloween party this
year well if you are I've got a great
edible centerpiece idea for you
some spiderweb cupcakes I have here 19
chocalate cupcakes that have white icing
on them so now I'm gonna decorate the
cupcakes with an easy spider web design
so to pipe the spider web design I'm
going to pipe some melted chocolate
through a parchment cones I'm just
taking a piece of parchment there fold a
triangle make a nice crease and just use
a paring knife to cut through the paper
this should be a really nice edge here
okay with the long side away from me
I'm going to curl this edge in and wrap
this triangle around the back and I'm
gonna pull down the two points to make a
very fine tip and that's all there is to
it from the top now I'm gonna fold down
these points to secure it make a little
notch in here to keep it from moving
that's my parchment cone so I have some
melted chocolate I'm just gonna pour it
right into the cone okay
fold down the top keep that chocolate in
there you don't want it escaping out the
top so then I'm gonna just snip the end
a little bit just to open it up a little
bit more and I can use this scrap paper
just to test my line it looks pretty
good so now holding onto the folded end
I'm going to start piping I'm gonna
think of it first as a cross down and
across just go right over the cupcakes
even where there isn't a cupcake just
continue the line same on this side
and then within each arc I'm going to do
three lines going right through the
middle
so now it's time to join these points
together so I'm gonna start in the
center and just make some little curves
from line to line and move up and just
keep going around in a circle and then
when you get to the end of one cupcake
just keep moving to the next one
and there it is it's really important
just to keep the lines flowing and it'll
really look like a spiderweb and if you
want you can pipe a little bit extra in
the middle like it's a spider right in
the center this is a treat for kids and
adults alike it's a great centerpiece
for any Halloween party
you
you
